languages.text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Знаниям: Варп{/g}.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — сторонник, то он и все его союзники получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, но при этом их максимальное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} сокращается на 9%.

traits.locale_text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text:
装备者获得+25{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}知识（亚空间）{/g}。
如果装备者拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者，则装备者与所有盟友对抗恶魔时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}会提高20%，但最大{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}会降低9%。
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+25{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}知识（亚空间）{/g}。
如果装备者拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者，则装备者与所有盟友对抗恶魔时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}会提高20%，但最大{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}会降低9%。

languages.text:
Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Знаниям: Варп{/g}.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — сторонник, то он и все его союзники получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, но при этом их максимальное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} сокращается на 9%.
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has Hereticus — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} against daemons, but suffer a −9% penalty to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Знаниям: Варп{/g}.
Если персонаж обладает мировоззрением Скверна — сторонник, то он и все его союзники получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g} при атаках демонов, но при этом их {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальное здоровье{/g} сокращается на 9%.

Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Знаниям: Варп{/g}.
Если персонаж обладает мировоззрением Скверна — сторонник, то он и все его союзники получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g} при атаках демонов, но при этом их {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальное здоровье{/g} сокращается на 9%.

languages.text:
このアイテムは使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}伝承（歪み）{/g}を+25増やす。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 門下生を所有している場合、使用者とその味方すべてのディーモンに対する{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+20%増加するが、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}には{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が−9%付与される。
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
このアイテムは使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}伝承（歪み）{/g}を25増やす。
使用者が異端者 ― 門下生を有している場合、使用者とその味方すべてのディーモンに対する{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が20％増加するが、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}には{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が9％付与される。

languages.text:
Este objeto aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Conocimiento (disformidad){/g} del portador en +25.
Si el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Partidario, él y todos sus aliados obtienen +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, pero sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del −9 % a sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas.
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Este objeto aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Conocimiento (disformidad){/g} del portador en +25.
Si el portador tiene la cualidad Hereticus: Partidario, él y todos sus aliados obtienen +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} contra daemons, pero sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −9 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas.

languages.text:
Dieser Gegenstand erhöht das {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Wissen (Warp){/g} des Trägers um +25.
Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} — Anhänger, erhalten er und alle Verbündeten +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, erleiden aber einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −9 % auf ihre maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Dieser Gegenstand erhöht das {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Wissen (Warp){/g} des Trägers um +25.
Hat der Träger Haereticus – Anhänger, erhalten er und alle seine Verbündeten +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} gegen Dämonen, aber erleiden einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -9 % auf ihre maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text:
Cet objet augmente de +25 la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Connaissance (Warp){/g} de l'utilisateur.
Si l'utilisateur possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Partisan, tous ses alliés et lui bénéficient de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, mais une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −9 % s'applique à leur réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cet objet augmente de +25 la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Connaissance (Warp){/g} de l'utilisateur.
Si l'utilisateur possède Hereticus — Partisan, tous ses alliés et lui bénéficient de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} contre les démons, mais une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -9 % s'applique à leur réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.

Cet objet augmente de +25 la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Connaissance (Warp){/g} de l'utilisateur.
Si l'utilisateur possède Hereticus — Partisan, tous ses alliés et lui bénéficient de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} contre les démons, mais une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -9 % s'applique à leur réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.

languages.text:
Bu eşya, takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Kültür (Öteboyut){/g} yeteneğini +25 artırır.
Takan kişi {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahipse o ve tüm dost birimleri, +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri kazanırlar ancak maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanlarına −%9 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar.
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
